00034         class US_API_EXPORT PVector : public PVectorUnsafe, public Mutex {
00035         public:
00039                 PVector(void);
00040 
00044                 virtual ~PVector(void);
00045 
00050                 int32 init(uint32 init_size = 128, uint32 incr = 16);
00051 
00057                 int32 add(void* ptr)
00058                 {
00059                         MutexLocker ml(this); return PVectorUnsafe::add(ptr);
00060                 }
00061 
00067                 int32 del(uint32 idx)
00068                 {
00069                         MutexLocker ml(this); return PVectorUnsafe::del(idx);
00070                 }
00071 
00078                 void* operator[](uint32 idx)
00079                 {
00080                         MutexLocker ml(this); return (*(PVectorUnsafe *) this)[idx];
00081                 }
00082 
00086                 void clear(void)
00087                 {
00088                         MutexLocker ml(this); PVectorUnsafe::clear();
00089                 }
00090 
00094                 uint32 getSize(void)
00095                 {
00096                         MutexLocker ml(this); return PVectorUnsafe::getSize();
00097                 }
00098 
00102                 uint32 getCount(void)
00103                 {
00104                         MutexLocker ml(this); return PVectorUnsafe::getCount();
00105                 }
00106 
00110                 uint32 getIncrement(void)
00111                 {
00112                         MutexLocker ml(this); return PVectorUnsafe::getIncrement();
00113                 }
